name: Daisy's Birthday Blowout
description:
A Unity based top down 2D shooter for UCI VGDC Fall 2016 inspired by Splatoon and Hotline Miami. Wholesome fun for the whole family!

Credits
  • Jonathan Nguyen - Project Leader
  • Carmine Choi - Programmer
  • Rachel Lee - Artist
  • Adi Iyer - VGDC Officer Mentor
